name: Mining Simulator (Circle)
description:
Welcome to Mining Simulator!

   - - HOW TO PLAY - -

scratch catt store:

Worker Cat: gives you 5 stone per sec

Drill Cat: gives you 23 iron per sec

Bomber Cat: gives you 40 gold per sec

Pickaxe Upgrade: 5 stone/iron/gold/emerald/diamond per click

stone - gold machine:

Its actually pretty straight forward ngl
